recipe.recipe_name: Spinach and Mushroom Egg White Frittata
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup fresh spinach, chopped, 1 cup mushrooms, sliced, 1/2 cup onions, diced, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 4 egg whites, 1/4 cup low-fat milk, 1/4 teaspoon salt, Ground black pepper, to taste, 1/4 cup reduced-fat feta cheese, crumbled, Fresh herbs (such as parsley or chives), for garnish
recipe.directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a non-stick, oven-proof skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions and mushrooms, and cook until the onions are translucent and the mushrooms have released their moisture, about 5-7 minutes, Stir in the chopped spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes, In a bowl, whisk together the egg whites, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour this mixture over the saut√©ed vegetables in the skillet, Sprinkle the top with crumbled feta cheese, Place the skillet in the oven and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the frittata is set and the cheese has melted, Remove from the oven, garnish with fresh herbs, slice, and serve while warm.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 150, Total fat 6g, Protein 18g, Cholesterol 10mg, Total carbohydrate 8g, Dietary fiber 2g, Monounsaturated fat 3g, Saturated fat 2g, Added sugars 0g, Sodium 510mg, Trans fat 0g, Potassium 300mg, Total sugars 4g
